Title: Age Verification System
Description: Implement age gates for users under 18 to comply with COPPA and state regulations

Title: Location-Based Content Filtering
Description: Block content based on user location to meet regional compliance requirements

Title: User Profile Management
Description: Basic user profile creation and management functionality

Title: Live Streaming Feature
Description: Allow users to stream live video content to their followers

Title: E-commerce Integration
Description: Enable users to purchase products directly through the platform

Title: Content Recommendation Algorithm
Description: AI-powered content recommendation system that personalizes user experience

Title: User-Generated Content Platform
Description: Platform for users to upload and share their own content

Title: Advertising System
Description: Targeted advertising system with user data analysis

Title: Data Analytics Dashboard
Description: Analytics dashboard for tracking user behavior and platform metrics

Title: Social Media Sharing
Description: Social media integration allowing users to share content across platforms

Title: Direct Messaging Feature
Description: Private messaging system between users with end-to-end encryption

Title: Video Upload and Processing
Description: Allow users to upload and process video content with automated moderation

Title: Payment Processing System
Description: Secure payment processing for in-app purchases and subscriptions

Title: Location Services
Description: Location-based features including nearby content and location sharing

Title: Parental Controls
Description: Parental control features for managing children's access to content

Title: Content Moderation Tools
Description: Automated and manual content moderation system for inappropriate content

Title: Data Export Feature
Description: Allow users to export their personal data in compliance with GDPR

Title: Cookie Consent Management
Description: Manage user consent for cookies and tracking technologies

Title: Age-Restricted Content Filtering
Description: Filter content based on age ratings and parental controls

Title: Geographic Data Localization
Description: Store user data in specific geographic regions for compliance
